dublin_core.dcvalue: Esther Nalugya, Program Officer, UNHCO, Email: enalugya@unhco.or.ug | Hilde Eugelink, SDU Health Coordinator, IICD, Email: heugelink@iicd.org

A multi-faceted ICT project that includes SMS campaign sensitizing communities about maternal and child health issues, SMS messages from UNHCO to collect feedback on health service delivery and SMS reminders to pregnant women about antenatal care appointments.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:19:05Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 reduction_of_maternal_mortality.pdf: 266831 bytes, checksum: b26463866d69343fea49929dfe98bffd (MD5)

Reduction of Maternal Mortality through ICT
